description: Extravagant, disco and fun. This colourful cocktail stands out from the crowd. Learn how to make an exquisite sugar tuile for a gorgeous garnish.
name: Disco Russian Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Pour glucose on tray, then spread into a thin layer. Add red and yellow colouring. Use a skewer to marble colours. Bake for 15 minutes or until bubbles form. Allow to cool completely.

Combine vodka, parfait amour, lemon juice, grenadine, blue curacao and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a 250ml glass. Serve garnished with sugar tuile and crystal stick.
